MementoBuffer - Class in mementos
MementoBuffer is to store the state of the buffer at a time.

MementoCommand - Class in mementos
MementoCommand is used to store the state of recordable commands.
MementoCommand(EditionEngine, Recorder) - Constructor for class mementos.MementoCommand
Instantiate a MementoCommand that will store the state of a command (given engine and recorder).

mementos - package mementos
 
MementoSelect - Class in mementos
MementoSelect is to store the SelectRecordable commands.

MementoSelection - Class in mementos
MementoSelection is to store the state of a selection at a time.

MementoSystem - Class in mementos
MementoSystem is to store the necessary informations to restore the context after a command when needed.

Instantiates a new memento system.
